00025 #ifndef _BASE_PARAMETRICPATHREP_
00026 #define _BASE_PARAMETRICPATHREP_
00027 
00028 #include <base/PathRep>
00029 #include <base/Expression>
00030 #include <base/Math>
00031 
00032 
00033 namespace base {
00034 
00035 
00036 /// Concrete path representation as a set of symbolic parametric equations (functions of s)
00037 class ParametricPathRep : public PathRep
00038 {
00039 public:
00040   ParametricPathRep(const ExpressionVector& p);
00041 
00042   virtual Object& clone() const
00043     { return *NewObj ParametricPathRep(v); }
00044 
00045   virtual String className() const { return String("ParametricPathRep"); }
00046 
00047   /// get cartesian position at s:[0..1]
00048   virtual Point3 position(Real s) const;
00049 
00050   /// get orientation at s:[0..1]
00051   virtual Orient orientation(Real s) const;
00052 
00053   virtual Real distinguishedValue(Int i) const;
00054 
00055   /// number of distinguished s values
00056   virtual Int numDistinguishedValues() const;
00057 
00058   /// translate the path position by t
00059   virtual void translate(const Vector3& t);
00060 
00061   /// rotate the path orientation by r
00062   virtual void rotate(const Quat4& r);
00063 
00064   /// transform the path by m
00065   virtual void transform(const Matrix4& m);
00066 
00067   virtual void scalePosition(Real s);
00068 
00069   virtual void serialize(Serializer& s);
00070 
00071 protected:
00072   enum Flags { None=0, HasOrient=1 };
00073 
00074   ParametricPathRep() {}
00075 
00076   ExpressionVector v; ///< parametric rep of path (symbolic expressions for x,y,z[,r,p,y | ,q0,q1,q2,w]) in terms of s in [0..1]
00077   
00078   Int flags;
00079 
00080   friend class Trajectory;
00081   friend class Serializable::SerializableDerivedInstantiator<ParametricPathRep>;
00082 };
00083 
00084 
00085 } // base
00086 
00087 #endif
